name: Big Robot Fight Big Monster: The Game
name_original: Big Robot Fight Big Monster: The Game
description:
Nerv Simulator

Disclaimer! I made this game at 4:00 AM. It has not been playtested, and needs to be fixed in many ways.

Kill the angel and save the command center by typing in commands to the Eva Pilot!

Controls:

Click the box below the list of commands you want to perform. 

Type on your keyboard what commands you want to do, and when you want to submit it you hit the right control button on your keyboard to send it to the computer to process. (capitalization doesn't matter)

Once it is fully processed and if the command was approved the Pilot performs the action.

Devlog:

This game was made as a warm up for the other games I will be creating this semester. I made this in a day, and finished at 4:00 AM. It was heavily inspired by the UI of Evangelion and adhered it to the prompt for the week which was "Slow". After spitballing some ideas with some friends we came up with a slow typing game and so I ran with it. It's not perfect for sure, but it's exploring some cool ideas and it's my first strategy simulation game! If I had more time I would playtest it more and get rid of the individual boxes and build out the delayed typing mechanic more.
